mapper.sql: select t.rec_id, t.parent_id, t.ancestors, t.menu_name, t.menu_detail, t.rec_status, t.rec_person, t.rec_time, t.rec_updateperson, t.rec_updatetime, u.nick_name as user_name from d_project_info_menu t left join sys_user u on t.rec_person=u.user_name
mapper.select:
where t.rec_status='1'
and t.parent_id=#{parent_id}
and t.ancestors like concat('%',#{ancestors},'%')
and t.menu_name like concat('%',#{menu_name},'%')
mapper.update: update s_info_menu set ancestors=REPLACE (ancestors,#{ance},#{newanc}) where ancestors like concat(#{ance1},'%')
